summary.para: Recompresses an image. Implemented in an ImageRecompress object, this method accepts x and y dimensions with a designation of quality. The method creates a stream containing the new image that has been recompressed to the specified size.

param.name: psi
param.para: A pointer to the object containing the stream of the image to read.

param.name: cx
param.para: The x dimension of the image to return.

param.name: cy
param.para: The y dimension of the image to return.

param.name: iQuality
param.para: An indication of recompression quality that can range from 0 to 100.

param.name: pstg
param.para: A pointer to an interface on the object that contains the stream to be written to.

param.name: ppstrmOut
param.para: The address of an interface pointer variable that receives the output stream written to.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code otherwise. If the image in the input stream is less than the size specified by cx and cy, then S_FALSE is returned.

summary.para: Exposes a method that recompress images.

remarks.para: Implement IImageRecompress if you are implementing an image object that may need recompressing. The IImageRecompress interface is implemented in the ImageRecompress object.
